pages.text: Mobs with this trait can damage equipments, especially when equipments have high durability.$(br2)It only appears at very high level, so don't worry too much.

To deal with mobs with this trait, make sure you have ways to restore or preserve durability for your equipments, such as Hardened or Life Mending.$(br2)You can also use Life Mending with Safeguard, which saves your equipments under most circumstances.
